##### Download AOP products

Download Airborne Observation Platform (AOP) data. A Product ID and Field Site from the Product Catalog or the NEON <a href='http://data.neonscience.org/static/browse.html' target='_blank'>data portal</a> are required. Select years to download by clicking on the table.
